pages.text: $(li)Makai Symphony made the song played in the $(l)Void Worm Boss Fight$() called $(l)Colossal Enemy$().$(br)$(li)Makai Symphony made the song played in the $(l)Ignis Boss Fight$() called $(l)God of Blaze$().
$(li)Makai Symphony made the song played in the $(l)Warped Mosco Boss Fight$() called $(l)Aerial Combat$().
